alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 06 at 9:53AM AKST until January 07 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 to 45 below zero through midday Friday. * WHERE...The Haines and South Klondike Highways. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be very strong, especially along the South Klondike Highway. Wind chills may warm into the 20s below zero this afternoon along the Haines Highway, but should fall again Thursday night.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
